nodes.text: The Skirmish in the Crimson Corridor was a minor skirmish between Jedi Padawan Darsha Assant and a Gotal member of the Raptors that took place in the Crimson Corridor, a district in the Third Quadrant of Coruscant's Zi-Kree Sector. The Gotal lost the skirmish, and his weapon and hand were destroyed/cut off by the Jedi Padawan's lightsaber.
